description: Ensure customer_id has no NULL values
condition: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table} WHERE customer_id IS NULL

description: Ensure email has no NULL values
condition: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table} WHERE email IS NULL
SELECT customer_id FROM {table} GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table} WHERE email NOT LIKE '%@%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table} WHERE age < 0 OR age > 120

description: Ensure created_date is not in the future
condition: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table} WHERE created_date > GETDATE()

description: Ensure amount has no NULL values
condition: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table} WHERE amount IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table} WHERE status NOT IN ('Active' 'Inactive' 'Pending')
